page.title: 06THE CORNER STORES
page.content: Mr Roger Mason owns the{Corner Stores and runs it with his wife Anne.They have been there for 7 \ years. It is the first time they have ever been shopkeepers. There{busiest days }are monday and tuesday,and their busiest times each day are 09.00 to 09.30 and 15.15 to 16.00.They work from 07.00 to 19.00.They stock up from the warehouse in Bridgwater as required.They sell most of their goods to adults and their most popular items are - frozen foods,sweets,cotton and needlework materials.Mr Mason has 4 staff because {trade has increased.People shop locally because of the increased cost of petrol which is now over Â£2 per gallon.The building is 300 years old.It used to be an old{Bakery.}There are oven markings in the lounge.The present kitchen was a dough making room.
